item.title: Ok ive got a basic tele command but
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Oh, sorry…

Like this…

if (command.startsWith("staffhelp")) { teleportToX = 2604; teleportToY = 3105; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; if (playerRights >= 1) { sM("A Player Needs Your Help!"); } else { } }

item.title: Ok ive got a basic tele command but
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

Skype™:

Hello, (Playername) needs help Help him here(Wherever your help place is).

Yeah, i can write a basic sM to everyone, how can i allow just staff users to see this?

item.title: Ok ive got a basic tele command but
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“staffhelp”)) {
teleportToX = 2604;
teleportToY = 3105;
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

I need a sM to all all the people on the server with player rights above 1 saying something, any ideas?
